# Content Package

The content package provides utilities for indexing, loading, transforming, and searching content across applications.

## Modules

- `indexing/` - Content indexing and search functionality
- `manifest/` - Content manifest creation and validation
- `loaders/` - Content loading from various sources
- `transformers/` - Content transformation utilities
- `search/` - Advanced search with scoring and filtering

## Usage

```ts
import { createContentIndex, searchContent } from '@repo/content/indexing';
import { loadContent } from '@repo/content/loaders';
import { applyPipeline } from '@repo/content/transformers';
```
